short_summary: A RFPQ is being issued to obtain specialized architectural services involving the conservation of artworks.
description: A detailed description of the procurement is available on the tender notice
full_summary:
### Artwork Conservation *

#### **Identification**

*   Tender ID: #CB-358-952958-48
*   Amendment Number: 4
*   Solicitation Reference Number: SEN-034 2324
*   Tender Title: Request for Proposal – Artwork Conservation
*   Language of the solicitation: English and French

####  **Publishing and Closing Dates**

*   Publication Date: October 31, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: November 22, 2023, at 11:00 a.m. (EST)

#### **Unlocking Access to Post-Secondary Education and Research**

*   **Subject Area**:
    *   81101533: Restoration architectural services
    *   81102900: Cultural conservation-restoration engineering services

####  **Procedure Selection criterion**

*   Evaluation of proposals will be based on the combined rating of technical merit and price.

####  **Location Category**

*   Location: National Capital Region (NCR)

####  **Shortlisted Applicant Information**

*   Contact Person: Shirley Chartrand
*   Contact Email: [proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca](mailto:proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca)
*   Contact Phone: 613-995-8888

####  **Release of information**

*   Request of information must be submitted in writing by email at *proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca*  and will be answered in writing in order to be distributed to all bidders.

####  **Number of available options**

*   Number of available options: two (2), additional one-year options; under the term of this requirement.

#### **Area of need**

*   Area of need: artwork Conservation throughout the term of this requirement.

####  **Deadline of submission**

*   Bids must be received before 11:00 a.m. EST on November 22, 2023.

####  **A number of tender documents**

*   Interested suppliers can obtain a copy of the tender documents from the government’s electronic tendering system at  [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca),identifiable by the identification [www.canadabuys.canadac.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canadac.ca).


I followed the client’s rules on formatting and made the content as interesting as possible! Any changes? Any changes? 

Make sure to bring your input so I can
